name: HomeTalk
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: HomeTalk offers seamless integration with Amazon Alexa, enabling users to control their smart home devices using voice commands. This feature allows users to manage their home environment effortlessly through Alexa-enabled devices such as Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, and Echo Show. By linking HomeTalk with Alexa, users can enjoy hands-free control over various home appliances, including lights, fans, ACs, and humidifiers.
